data.title: Early Poems of Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
data.meta_description: Houghton Mifflin and Company, 1885. Houghton Mifflin and Company 1885 . Blue Cloth over boards, gold and black designs and lettering. 65 poems , starting with VOICES OF THE NIGHT 1839, to THE SPANISH STUDENT 1843, which appears to be a PLAY. Copyright , 1884, by Houghton, Mifflin & Co. the Riverside Press Cambridge:electrotyped and printed by H. O. Houghton and Co. / NO DJ. Item #biblio97
data.text:
Houghton Mifflin and Company, 1885. Houghton Mifflin and Company (1885). Blue Cloth over boards, gold and black designs and lettering. 65 poems , starting with VOICES OF THE NIGHT 1839, to THE SPANISH STUDENT 1843, which appears to be a PLAY. Copyright , 1884, by Houghton, Mifflin & Co. the Riverside Press Cambridge:electrotyped and printed by H. O. Houghton and Co. / NO DJ. Item #biblio97

Copyright , 1884, by Houghton, Mifflin & Co. the Riverside Press Cambridge: electrotyped and printed by H. O. Houghton and Co.

Title page slightly loose from body.

Top and bottom of spine show wear, Corners a bit worn. It is otherwise a solid and impressive copy. Gold gilt all sides, gold as well as front and spine designs, front and spine are embossed. impressive front cover and design, Spine a bit discolored and spotting to the back cover.

Inscription on second leaf end paper: 'Mattie Hay Dec 25, 1884.'

Picture of Longfellow in Cameo with this hand written inscription :Yours very truly Henry W. Longfellow.
